name: UIImage.SymbolScale
desc: Constants that indicate which scale variant of a symbol image to use.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default scale variant that matches the system usage.

items.name: case small
items.desc: The small variant of the symbol image.

items.name: case medium
items.desc: The medium variant of the symbol image

items.name: case large
items.desc: The large variant of the symbol image.
